member.name: T:UltimateTemperatureLibrary.Celsius
member.summary: Represents the Celsius scale unit.

member.name: M:UltimateTemperatureLibrary.Celsius.#ctor
member.summary:
Initializes a new instance of Celsius class.
Value is set to Absolute zero.

member.name: M:UltimateTemperatureLibrary.Celsius.#ctor(UltimateTemperatureLibrary.Interfaces.IConversionToCelsius)
member.summary:
Initializes a new instance of Celsius class using by shared interface.
Value is set to Absolute zero if null object is passed into constructor.
member.param: An object that can be converted to the Celsius unit.

member.name: M:UltimateTemperatureLibrary.Celsius.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary:
Initializes a new instance of Celsius class using parsing from string.
Kelvin unit is used when no information about unit is provided in the input string.
Value is set to Absolute zero if null object or invalid string is passed into constructor.
member.param: A string caring an information about value and unit.

member.name: M:UltimateTemperatureLibrary.Celsius.#ctor(System.Double)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of Celsius class using a double value.
member.param: An initialization value from the Celsius scale.

member.summary: Gets a temperature value from the Celsius scale.

member.summary: Gets an array of the Celsius unit identifications for a in-string scale matching.
